hero_title.text: I make things. Some work. A couple are even useful.

about_bio.text: Computing major at UCSB, Software Engineer Intern at AppFolio, policy wonk, constitutional law geek. Not necessarily in that order. Ask me about why it's all John Roberts' fault.

project_preview_description.text: Streamlining medical professional workflows with report generation and data management. Built on ASP.NET Core, React, and Electron.
A Vehicle Routing Problem simulation using OpenStreetMaps data to find optimal evacuation routes for Glacier National Park in case of emergency.
A comprehensive framework for international climate cooperation.
A detailed analysis of the worrying trends in teenage substance abuse and its long-run impacts on society.
A small Chrome extension to streamline Git-based document composition workflows. Over 500 installs!
Virtual machine implementation of a RISC architecture in C including an emulator, assembler, and disassembler.
